title: Potri Paadadi Penne Lyrics Thevar Magan
stanzas:
thekku dhisai aanda
mannar inamthaan ho
mukkulatha serndha
thevar maganthaan ho.

enna solla mannu valam
dingu dangu dingu dangu
dingu dangi do
maththavanga kannupadum
dingu dangu dingu dangu
dingu dangi do

enna solla mannu valam
maththavanga kannupadum
andha kadha ippa ulla
sandhathinga kaetkavenum
nammuyirkku mela
maanam mariyathai

maanam ilanthaale
vazha theriyaathe
perusellaam sonnaanga
sonnapadi ninnaanga
gunathaal manathaal
kalaimaan aanaanga

thekku dhisai aanda
mannar inamthaan ho
mukkulatha serndha
thevar maganthaan ho.

munnorukku munnor ellaam
dingu dangu dingu dangu
dingu dangi do
innaarunnu kandukolla
dingu dangu dingu dangu
dingu dangi do

munnorukku munnor ellaam
innaarunnu kandukolla
yaedu eduthu ezhudhicholla
onnu rendu moonu alla

mukkulathor kalyanamthaan
muthu muthu kamnalamthaan
ekkulamum vazhthu sollum
engalukku ekkaalamthaan.

thekku dhisai aanda
mannar inamthaan ho
mukkulatha serndha
thevar maganthaan ho.
